bug.author: Xianjin111
bug.description:
Thank you for your perfect work. I have a problem when I ran the demo.py on Ubuntu with python 3.7 as following: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46471572/78009883-4341ae80-7374-11ea-83e3-e7eee7c5aa9e.PNG></denchmark-link>
Could you please give me some suggestions? Thank you very much.

comments.comment: opencv imread returns None if the file is missing Can you check that the png file exists using os.path.isfile
It seems like that is an ffmpeg failure. Could you try to run a simple ffmpeg example to see if that works?

It seems like that is an ffmpeg failure. Could you try to run a simple ffmpeg example to see if that works?
Thank you. It's solved. I re-installed the ffmpeg in Anaconda from <denchmark-link:https://anaconda.org/menpo/ffmpeg/files>https://anaconda.org/menpo/ffmpeg/files</denchmark-link> .
